abstract: A closer look at why the annual Census Bureau data on household income has not captured the fact that income seems to have fallen more since the recession ended than it did during the recession.
snippet: A closer look at why the annual Census Bureau data on household income has not captured the fact that income seems to have fallen more since the recession ended than it did during the recession.
lead_paragraph: Anyone with detailed knowledge of the annual Census Bureau data on household income may be surprised by the new study Robert Pear describes in today's Times. From the article:
